EmailTemplate.name: BR Post Update Email Blast
EmailTemplate.subject: Ready to charge $300 an hour? Visit MBO’s new and improved bill rate calculator and guide
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
I wanted to share the news with you that we have made some updates to the MBO Partners bill rate calculator. <http://www.mbopartners.com/#billrate> Now may be the time to re-assess your estimated income, expenses and billable hours to determine a new hourly rate.
For your reference, here’s the link to download our 20-page Bill Rate Resource Guide <http://www.mbopartners.com/files/pdfs/mbo-bill-rate-resource-guide.pdf>. I hope that the material is helpful to you in determining an appropriate consulting bill rate to charge clients.
This spring, in response to the lack of quality content for solo consultants, MBO Partners launched its popular new, monthly Independent Consulting Brief <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief>. Sign up to recieve free educational tools for consultants and small firms.
Regards, {{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} ___________________________________ {{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} {{lead.EM LName:default=Arhancet}} Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6000 f: 703-793-6070 e: {{lead.EM Email:default=sarhancet@mbopartners.com}} w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
